text: Hey R developers - I’m new here, but I’m a developer for CircleCI (sorry if advertising goes against the rule). I’m currently working on creating an R image for use in a developer CI environment and I’d love to get some feedback on any common packages that are used or what you would like to see included as part of  the image in your development process. I’m completely open to DMs or replies within a thread and I can grant you access to our alpha version of the image as well!

elements.text: Hey R developers - I’m new here, but I’m a developer for CircleCI (sorry if advertising goes against the rule). text: I'm not sure I understand your question. would that R imaged be aimed to develop R, check packages, run workflows, or all of the above? In any case that it is easy to use and set up the configuration files automatically, and edit the .Rbuildignore if for checking packages.
